long_description: With an airy suspension that is both light and comfortable, the Osprey Exos 34 Pack gives you ultralight performance in a supportive weekend pack. Aluminum hoop frame shifts load weight to your lumbar region and hipbelt. Ventilated, padded shoulder straps; sternum strap has a built-in whistle and pocket for energy gel. Padded hipbelt features an easy forward-pull closure; tensioned-mesh back panel aids airflow. Floating top pocket is removable; over-the-top compression strap secures the main compartment. Hydration design places the reservoir (sold separately) in a cavity behind the back panel for easy refilling. Super-light compression straps route over or under side pockets. Innovative system allows you to stow and remove trekking poles without taking off the pack. Front and side stretch-woven pockets; zippered mesh hipbelt pockets; under-lid pocket. Sleeping-pad straps and a single tool attachment with bungee tie-off let you strap on extra gear. The Osprey Exos 34 pack is made from durable ripstop nylon. Closeout.
short_description: With an airy suspension that is both light and comfortable, the Osprey Exos 34 Pack gives you ultralight performance in a supportive weekend pack.
